text: The VDL SB250 (originally called the DAF SB250) was a single-decker chassis of a bus. It was made in 1997 by DAF Bus and then by VDL Bus & Coach. The SB250 chassis could be fitted with bodywork made by VDL Bus & Coach companies such as VDL Berkhof, Valkenswaard or Jonckheere).. In 2004, VDL made an improved chassis called the SB250+. It had an improved front suspension. ==References== ==Other websites== *Product description of VDL SB250+ VDL Bus & Coach Category:Full-size buses Category:Low-floor buses SB250
title: VDL SB250
